name: 黃瀅瑛
objective:
本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。

Introductory course to linear algebra and its applications...
schedule:
W01: TBD
W02: No class
W03: Introduction
W04: Matrix multiplication
W05: Inverses & transposes
W06: Vector spaces
W07: Linear transformations
W08: Orthogonal vectors
W09: Midterm exam
W10: Projections & least squares
W11: Orthogonal bases
W12: FFT
W13: Determinants
W14: Eigenvalues & eigenvectors
W15: Diagonalization
W16: Difference equations & differential equations
W17: Positive definite matrices
W18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework, in-class performance & quiz: 30%
Midterm: 35%
Final exam: 35%
materials:
Gilbert Strang, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, Brooks/Cole, 4th ed. (2006)
ISBN: 0-03-010567-6
